subtitleNullable: This CSV file provides recent 1000 IMDB rating movies.
descriptionNullable:
Detail about the dataset :
The data is collected by web scraping for IMDb "Top 1000" (Sorted by Popularity Ascending) movies from the following website (https://www.imdb.com/search/title/?groups=top_1000)
column description :
movie : Name of the movie.
year : Release year of the movie.
timeMin :  Length of the movie (In minutes)
IMDb : IMDB rating of the movie.
votes : Votes given by IMDB registered users.
metascores : Rating of the film (Critic opinion as Metascore)
us_grossMillions : Gross income of the movie ( In Millions)
Director : Name of director of the movie.

TASK:
Data analysis can be performed on the above dataset.
Data cleaning, handle  Null values
Find how many movies were released with respect to the year.
Find most popular movies wrt gross /Metascore/votes
Create Bins for movie length(time) or gross
Find Popular director wrt rating/gross income.
